verbose_text: Similar to PIE2, soil NH 4 + -N was rapidly nitrified to NO 3 - -N in urea and urea plus straw treatments and this process slowed down when using NI (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence: PIE2, soil NH 4  + -N was rapidly nitrified to NO 3  - -N in urea and urea plus straw treatments and this process slowed down when using NI
